div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-addition-peri-transplant-vs
Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-gvhd-prophylaxis-vs
Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-mobilizing-agents-vs
Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-post-hct-disease-therapy-planned-vs
Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-prep-regimen-vs
Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/med-prior-exposure-vs
